title: Brazil-UK: Supporting training and research in predictive microbiology, using ComBase and related software tools
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: For more efficient use of IT to handle food safety and spoilage problems. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Education,Retail Economic,Policy & public services
findingsText: Advanced IT tools are crucial in Quantitative Microbial Risk Assessment in Food Food waste and trade optimisation, risk assessment could especially benefit from globally pooled data and advanced IT tools. Agriculture, Food and Drink
